Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.audio

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.audio.SoundSource
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.audio.SoundSource
org.jsfml.audio.Sound
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.audio.Sound
public class Sound extends Sound
Provides functionality to instantiate a SoundBuffer and play a buffered sound.

    • isLoop

      public boolean isLoop()
      Returns whether or not the sound is looping.
      Returns:
      true if this sound is looping, false if not.

    • setLoop

      public void setLoop(boolean loop)
      Enables or disables repeated looping of the sound.

      If this is set to true and the sound has finished playing, it will be restarted from the beginning as if setPlayingOffset(Time.ZERO) was called.

      Parameters:
      loop - true to enable looping, false to disable.

    • getPlayingOffset

      public Time getPlayingOffset()
      Gets the playing offset from where to start playing the underlying buffer.
      Returns:
      the playing offset from where to start playing the underlying buffer.

    • setPlayingOffset

      public void setPlayingOffset(@NotNull @NotNull Time offset)
      Sets the playing offset from where to play the underlying buffer.
      Parameters:
      offset - the playing offset in the underlaying buffer.
